channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - Racks 43R07 - 43R08
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 8, 2024, 00:00 - 04:00 UTC

Dec 19, 15:20 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 08/01/2024 00:00 UTC
End time : 08/01/2024 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers will be temporarily unreachable for 30 minutes each during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are moving servers to rack 43R08.

item.title: [RBX1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 14B01

item.title: [RBX7/8][Storage and Backups] - NAS HA maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 3, 2024, 05:30 - 07:30 UTC

Dec 12, 23:06 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/01/2024 05:30 UTC
End time : 03/01/2024 07:30 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will perform an update on the storage servers hosting your data.
This version will improve certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements.
During the maintenance period, your data will remain available.

item.title: [RBX6/3][Dedicated Servers] - Electrical issue - Room46
item.description:
Dec 25, 14:09 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 25/12/2023 03:06 UTC
End time : 25/12/2023 12:30 UTC
Root cause : Electrical issue.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 25, 13:10 UTC
Update - Our team continues to work on this issue.

Dec 25, 08:14 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Dec 25, 05:42 UTC
Update - The impacted servers are located in RBX3, 46A=>46K, Room46.

Dec 25, 05:05 UTC
Identified - Our technical teams are still noticing a few servers down, and are working on restoring the service.

Dec 25, 03:54 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 25/12/2023 03:06 UTC
Service impact : Due to an electrical problem, we lost several racks in the RBX6, but the problem has now been resolved.
Ongoing actions : We keep this under monitoring.

Dec 25, 03:34 UTC
Identified - Start time : 25/12/2023 03:06 UTC
Service impact : Multiple racks are temporarily unreachable in RBX6.
Root cause : Electrical issue.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.title: [RBX3/6][Dedicated Servers] - Multiple racks unreachable
item.description:
Dec 23, 11:41 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 23/12/2023 03:19 UTC
End time : 23/12/2023 06:30 UTC
Root cause : There was no restart of the UPS, we had to do a reboot.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 23, 08:20 UTC
Update - Our teams continue to work on the problem. A solution is being implemented.

Dec 23, 06:42 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 23/12/2023 03:19 UTC
End time : 23/12/2023 06:30 UTC
Service impact : Multiple racks are temporarily unreachable.
Root cause : There was no restart of the UPS, we had to do a reboot.
Ongoing actions : Monitoring

Dec 23, 03:35 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 23/12/2023 03:19 UTC
Service impact : Multiple racks are temporarily unreachable
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.description:

Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Dedicated Servers] - Delivery certificate
item.description:
Dec 19, 17:24 UTC
Resolved - Start time :23/10/2023 00:00 UTC
End time : 19/12/2023 17:00 UTC
Root cause : Software issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 18, 10:18 UTC
Update - Our technical teams will be carrying out a maintenance concerning the incident tomorrow, 19/12/2023. We'll keep you informed of the status of the incident once the maintenance has been completed.

Nov 8, 13:19 UTC
Update - Update : Our technical teams are still working on a definitive fix to implement it with the aim to avoid the problem in the future.

Oct 25, 15:20 UTC
Monitoring - Update : A fix has been deployed, we are monitoring the ticket to confirm the resolution.

Oct 25, 12:57 UTC
Identified - Start time : 23/10/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : The certificate of conformity for deliveries of Baremetal servers (except SYS and KS servers) is no longer issued automatically.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are working to resolve the problem. Certificates will be added as soon as possible.
Workaround : However, you can request your certificate from the support teams.

item.description:

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 15, 13:15 UTC
Identified - Start time : 15/12/2023 12:34 UTC
Service impact : IPMI KVM and remote reboot are unavailable
Root cause : Hardware issue.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently resolving the issue by replacing the IPMI switch.

item.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - G132A04
item.description:
Dec 13, 12:31 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 10/12/2023 08:16 UTC
End time : 13/12/2023 12:38 UTC
Root cause : Defective power system.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 12, 21:50 UTC
Identified - Our technical teams replaced the defected equipment. All servers in rack G132A04 are reachable but customers can't reboot remotely their servers.
We are currently working to solve the issue.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Dec 12, 14:11 UTC
Update - The equipment in fault is currently being replaced so that the problem can be rectified permanently.

Dec 10, 09:52 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 10/12/2023 08:16 UTC
Service impact : Servers were rebooting in loop.
Root cause : Defective power system.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams have carried out a temporary correction, and the problem has now been resolved. We are keeping this incident under monitoring.

Dec 10, 09:16 UTC
Identified - Start time : 10/12/2023 08:16 UTC
Service impact : Servers are rebooting in loop.
Root cause : Defective power system.
Ongoing actions : Our technical team are currently working on a fix.

item.title: [Global][Baremetal] - Network services incident notification
item.description:
Dec 12, 17:17 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 12, 16:43 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 12/12/2023 15:46 UTC
Service impact : No more impact on all network tasks related who leads issue on reopen, delivery, suspension, deletion, IP move or vRack move since 16:18 UTC.
Root cause : Software issue.
Ongoing actions : We keep this incident under monitoring.

Dec 12, 16:32 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Dec 12, 16:27 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 12/12/2023 15:46 UTC
Service impact : Issue on all network tasks related who leads issue on reopen, delivery, suspension, deletion, IP move or vRack move are impacted by this incident.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
